alert.note: Alert for Custer; Oglala Lakota (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 21 at 1:38AM MDT until June 21 at 2:30AM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: The National Weather Service in Rapid City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Custer County in southwestern South Dakota... Northwestern Oglala Lakota County in southwestern South Dakota... * Until 230 AM MDT. * At 138 AM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 5 miles northeast of Buffalo Gap, or 14 miles northeast of Hot Springs, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Intersection of Red Shirt and Cuny Table Roads, Red Shirt and Red Shirt Table Overlook. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
